ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 706
ygData.msgSnippet: ... needed my horse until I had him. For the aggro management alone it s worth the 8k. ... opposed to inside zones. For example, had a group in Plane of Storms
ygData.messageBody:
> As a lvl 60 druid with a horse I've got to say I never knew how much I
needed my horse until I had him. For the aggro management alone it's worth
the 8k.
> I notice the difference drastically when I"m grouped in outdoor zones
opposed to inside zones. For example, had a group in Plane of Storms
(outside zone) stayed on my horse and never got aggro once. Next night was
in North Temple of Veeshan, tried to sit between fights and picked up aggro
everytime something popped. From a casters point of view and the damage the
mobs do with one hit at higher levels. One hit can sometimes be deadly.
Wouldn't use the horse for solo'ing because of the slow start stop time, but
in groups it's the greatest.
>
Hmm.. slow start stop time? Is there a delay from when you tell it to stop
and such?
>
> I love my horse, the only thing that I hate is the visual of the horses
head and ears that get in the way of your targeting. The new LoY lizards
supposedly do not have that problem so even if it's a 1.5k plat hit for a
trade in. I might make the change. Although it will all depend on if I can
find a lizard to match my new dyed blue outfit :-)
>
Where are lizards sold? and are there quests to get them?
luv,
-Su
